description:
go/printer, gofmt: nicer formatting of multi-line returns

This affects corner (test) cases only; gofmt -w src misc
doesn't cause any changes.

- added additional test cases
- removed doIndent parameter from printer.valueSpec
  (was always false)
- gofmt -w src misc causes no changes

Fixes issue 1207.

messages.text:
LGTM

Can't really speak for the code change, and haven't thought thoroughly about the heuristic, but the test output looks a lot nicer to my eyes.

Hello dsymonds@golang.org, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=20edbffdf421 ***

go/printer, gofmt: nicer formatting of multi-line returns

This affects corner (test) cases only; gofmt -w src misc
doesn't cause any changes.

- added additional test cases
- removed doIndent parameter from printer.valueSpec
  (was always false)
- gofmt -w src misc causes no changes

Fixes issue 1207.

R=dsymonds, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5786060

subject: code review 5786060: go/printer, gofmt: nicer formatting of multi-line returns
